channel.title: [508] Add more <img=*> + edit existing ones [Palidino76 Base]
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]NOT SURE WHICH THIS IS SUPPOSED TO GO IN[/b][/size] Where do you add more/edit existing moderator/admin crowns. I tried using Tom's Cache Suite like I did for my 317, but it wouldn't load the 508's cache. ---------------------EDIT--------------------- Ok.. I found this guide > [url=http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=126758]http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=126758[/url] <, looked through the sprite dump and didn't find the mod crowns.. ---------------------EDIT2--------------------- .. I dumped it from Tom's Cache Suite from my 317.. Going to attempt to add..? -------------------ENDEDIT------------------- Sigh... I added them in a command as a test and I did.. [code]p.frames.sendMessage(p, "");[/code] And this is what I got: [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/3296/imgs.png[/img] How do I get them to sync with those? (meaning ) The names of them in the sprites are
Admin (2) Mod (2) owner
I also added them in the command and they didn't show up (). They are the same size as the regular crowns and have the fuchsia background. Anyone..? I have MSN, TeamViewer, and Skype. Just reply if you can help..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2009, 07:18:01 pm[/size][hr]I'm dying over here.. I really need this...

item.title: [508] Add more <img=*> + edit existing ones [Palidino76 Base]
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

[size=18pt]NOT SURE WHICH THIS IS SUPPOSED TO GO IN[/size]

Where do you add more/edit existing moderator/admin crowns. I tried using Tom’s Cache Suite like I did for my 317, but it wouldn’t load the 508’s cache.
---------------------EDIT---------------------
Ok… I found this guide > http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=126758 <, looked through the sprite dump and didn’t find the mod crowns…
---------------------EDIT2---------------------
… I dumped it from Tom’s Cache Suite from my 317… Going to attempt to add…?
-------------------ENDEDIT-------------------
Sigh…
I added them in a command as a test and I did…

p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<img=0><img=1><img=2><img=3><img=4><img=owner>");

And this is what I got:
How do I get them to sync with those? (meaning <img=*>)
The names of them in the sprites are

Admin (2) Mod (2) owner
I also added them in the command and they didn't show up (). They are the same size as the regular crowns and have the fuchsia background. Anyone..? I have MSN, TeamViewer, and Skype. Just reply if you can help..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2009, 07:18:01 pm[/size][hr]I'm dying over here.. I really need this...

Read full topic
